Summary: Fragrance that takes you out of this world!!
text:
I am so thrilled to have actually bought this oil. I wouldn't have done it had I not read the reviews of others so thanks to all of them!! This oil is so pure, untouched, and it smells so perfect. It has delicate coconut aroma, and a taste that is similar to eating tender coconut.

I would buy this again and again and again. For anyone who is looking for perfect coconut oil, this one is for you! You will never regret it.
